title: Madrona Tree
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Busy restaurant offering an international hybrid of cuisines from Lebanese to American with primarily sandwiches, soups, salads, veggies, and wraps. Around 5 clearly vegan dishes, and the in-house-made veggie burger sandwiches can be vegan. Focuses on organic and local produce. Family friendly atmosphere reminiscent of the small independent restaurants of Seattle and Portland.
